gameInfo.controlsInfo: To move as the avatar, use the arrow keys to turn and move. Press space to shoot a missileIn (missile).

winRules.text: If avatar and weaponToggle1 (Immovable) collide, then the avatar sprite will be transformed into avatar.
If avatar and weaponToggle2 (Immovable) collide, then the avatar sprite will be transformed into avatar.
If goal (Immovable) and avatar collide, then the goal (Immovable) sprite will be destroyed.
If there are no more goal (Immovable) sprites then you will win.

loseRules.text: If avatar and water (Immovable) collide, then the avatar sprite will be destroyed.
If there are no more avatarIn (avatar) sprites or avatarOut (avatar) sprites then you will lose.

pointsRules.text: If the avatar and the portalentry (Portal) collide, then you will gain 1 point.
If the goal (Immovable) and the avatar collide, then you will gain 5 points.
